website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and durable sport sandal that's easy to slip on and off.
pros: Massage nubs embedded in the sole
cons: Massage nubs may be a little too sharp for some if you're not wearing socks

customer_reviews.title: Feels like walking in Lego Hell.
customer_reviews.text: Most painful shoes I've ever tried wearing. I figured since they were Adidas, they wouldn't be awful, but I figured wrong. Every step feels like you're walking in the depths of Lego Hell. I'm not sure if it takes a while to break them in, but I really don't think I can force my feet into them long enough to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Garmanarnar

customer_reviews.title: Came on time (a week after ordering), cheap, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 when I am a 7.5 and they fit perfectly! Great color that brings back memories from the early 2000s. They are nobbed but the nobs are meant to work as massagers, which I like. My feet are 10/10 sensitive and ticklish and I can wear these comfortably, I don't see what the other reviewers are complaining about. I mean I can't walk on gravel or blacktop barefoot without wincing so these were a bit of a concern. 5 stars cheaper than on the Adidas website and the same quality!
customer_reviews.author: K A

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and sizing not true.
customer_reviews.text: pics below show my normal size 8 shoe on right and the Adidas are like a whole size too big! I have really tough/sore/tired feet so I like the feeling of the needles however I can imagine it would be quite painful as its pretty intense so I would be careful if you have soft feet that don't need to intense massage. When I walked in them they kept twisting outward which was very annoying. I don't want to have to use my toes to control my shoes when I'm walking. Might be as they were too big. Amazon offering refund thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a fake....
customer_reviews.text: The box was weird... and the bottom of the shoes are weird.. I'm pretty sure they're fake but at the same time I am keeping them because they're exactly like the real adidas so... SIZE DOWN do NOT get your regular size. I sized down to an eight (as I usually wear a 9) and they are perfect! they are massage shoes so don't expect them to feel uber comfy when you first get them. They take some getting used to but or oh so worth it. If you are on your feet a lot during the day at work and need some house shoes to take out the trash or get your mail these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but the little nubs that are supposed to massage my feet are incredibly painful instead. And my feet are callused and used to rough treatment. I am unable to recommend these sandals. Stay away if you think your feet might be the slightest bit tender. They're like wearing a shoe full of tiny rocks instead of tiny massagers.
customer_reviews.author: Meschevitz

customer_reviews.title: FEELS LIKE I'M STEPPING ON BURNING LEGOS. HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of these shoes a few years ago that were very comfortable. This pair feels like I'm constantly stepping on burning legos. Do not purchase this shoe! It is incredibly uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: JoslinTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so my sister bought these at DSW a few months ago and I've wanted some since! At first she hated them because they hurt so she had to wear them with socks. Last week I saw her and she says she loves them and doesn't wear them with socks anymore! She said after long days of going out or babysitting it feels good on her feet! I hope the same goes for me and they're exactly the same as my sisters! So yeah pretty happy with this purchase :3 Also true to size, in a 6 1/2 and she got a 6 (were the same size) and yup they fit good! At a 6.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive feet!
customer_reviews.text: The nubs on these sandals were pretty rough on my foot bottoms. They didn't exactly hurt, but caused irritation and itchiness. If you have sensitive feet, or are just one of those people who have hyper-reactive nerves, don't buy these. You will regret it. I like the look/style (reminds me of the 90's!). The fit was not great; I wear a womens 8...I ordered size 8 and they felt more like a 9.
customer_reviews.author: ThreatLevelMidnight

customer_reviews.title: hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these for several years and they were wonderful! So when one of them fell apart at the seem I ordered a new pair that looked exactly like my old ones. The insoles on the old ones were soft, smooth and very comfortable. These insoles are hard, knobby and really hurt when I stand on them. I can't imagine why anyone would want to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. A. Roof

customer_reviews.title: Hard on the Feet. So Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a pair of these since I was young and was very excited to finally get around to ordering a set. My Husband had a pair when he was younger and he loved them. Wow were these disappointing. The shoes are hard as can be. If I wear them with bare feet they are actually painful and they rubbed a blister into two parts of my feet within the first 10 minutes of my walk from the RV to the beach. I love the way they look so I gave them one star, but I would have to wear these with socks to make them wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Goos

customer_reviews.title: You may need patience to get used to these, but they are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My feet feel revived after I wear them. I do need to say, though that I am a true size 9 and was debating whether to order my true size or a size smaller. When the 9s came they were much too large and I had to return them. The size 8 is perfect. I looked at the reviews and some reviews said they were true to size and some said they ran large. So I ordered my true size. Something to consider but overall once I got the right fit in the smaller size they really massage my feet well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Painful!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely painful. My feet feel raw anytime I wear these. They are good quality and if you are insensitive then maybe these will work for you. But I can only wear for a few mins at a time. So I’m probably going to donate them. I do like the adjustable strap, though. I tried wearing them with thick socks but they tore my socks up. Just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurts like hell
customer_reviews.text: I have RH arthritis. Comfortable shoes are ones of most important things to keep my pain under control. AFter reading some comments about this pair shoes giving massage-like therapy, I figure that it wouldn't hurt to try them out. Oh, boy! What a mistake I have made! First of all, they do not have any arch support. They also hurt my feet like hell because of the bumpy things! After walking on them for five minutes, I'd be in agony!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Labby

customer_reviews.title: Adidas fan.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sports sandel. This is my 3rd pair of Adissage slides. I wore the nubs down on the first pair. I got 2 pair; one for inside and one for out. I have Achilles tendinitis; the massaging nubs relieve the heel pressure and tenderness.It's like acupressure for the feet. If you have tender feet, wear a light sock with these until you get used to the slides. Not made for lengthy walks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, style and room to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenaged daughter and was very happy to see she could adjust the velcro closure over the instep. I did try them on as well b/c I was curious how the sensory input from the footbed felt. Very comfortable, and provides an ongoing stimulation/massage to the entire sole of the foot. She's very happy to wear these almost daily and we enjoy that we didn't have to pay more than local retail for them! Would definitely consider getting a set myself, once we live somewhere where snow isn't a daily concern in shoe choice!
customer_reviews.author: DianaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Prongs under your feet...get use to it LoL
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was purchasing these with the little prongs stubs whatever you want to call them built into the surface of the sandals...I needed these to take a shower in after I work out so I don't have to stand on the shower floor barefoot at my local gym... They work great, They also dry pretty quick... the only thing is if you have sensitive feet I think the built-in prongs, nubs, will definitely take some getting use to...I rather deal with the nubs then place my foot on the floor and risk catching athletes foot... but overall I like them.
customer_reviews.author: fefe

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: My beloved flip flops broke, and I needed a replacement fast. Decided to go with these Adidas slides, which I have been purchasing since my soccer days in high school. They're high quality, they take a beating, and they are very classic looking with the iconic Adidas style. The 8 fits my size 8 feet perfectly. Only issue is that the massaging sole took a bit to get used to. My feet hurt bad the first few days...so bad I thought I might have to give up. Now they're fine, and the massaging part is nice and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals have saved my feet. I work in healthcare where I'm on my feet, on concrete, for 10 hours a day. Some days I'm limping by the end of my shift. Then I bought these sandals. Not gonna lie; at first the nobbies hurt my feet. As I wore them more and more they began to do their work and now I live in them when I'm home. If I could get them in more colors, I'd wear them to church, lol. Seriously, they are fantastic. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karlabenoist

customer_reviews.title: These Hurt sooooo bad
customer_reviews.text: Does these Sandler’s hurt anyone else? I wore them for a couple hours for the first time and I was limping with pain after. My feet are still throbbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this style from Adidas for over six years, and when they wear out, I buy them again. This time, my plantar fascia was very bothersome, but once I put them on and wore them for a couple of days, the sole of my foot settled down. I don't understand why the pink and black version - which I would have preferred - is SO much more expensive than the black and white, and not worth an extra $20 to me. I could have purchased three pair of the black and white for the price of one pair of the pink and black....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brutal on your Feet!!!!! #OUCH
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look of these slippers but I CANT WEAR THEM! The porcupine like rubber soles hurt my feet so bad!! Even with socks! They are not soft at all!!! I wish i would have gotten a different pair... i keep thinking they will wear down with each use... but no.. my feet are hurting on the bottoms of my feet for the second day in a row. just Brutal .
customer_reviews.author: Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied and amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This one is too awesome. I wish i could give more than 5 star ratings to this slide. Definitely highly recommended. On the first day of using it, felt uncomfortable with the nubs much but from second day its helping a lot. As per the one reviewer, if u have use to these nubs then plain sandals/flipflops are not enjoyable now 😊. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jsak

customer_reviews.title: My definition of massage isn't Burning discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's just my feet, but these things hurt!! With thick socks they were tolerable for about 5-10 min if I was moving around. Standing in them was too much and made by feet burn. Barefoot, I kicked them off after 10 steps. I returned these and I'll get a pair without the "massagers". They did the opposite of massage for me!
customer_reviews.author: MMG

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality and expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 10 ladies as that's my size! Well! It was almost as if it was a size 11 in my feet! Also there are prongs on the bottom on inside part of the shoe where your foot goes in. For some reason, when i returned em and got size 9, the size 9 pair HURT like heck with the prongs?! Cant figure it out but I dont recommend these shoes! Too expensive and quality is "heh"!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Whorton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute true to fit but not for sensitive feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these slides they are cute and fit perfectly the only problem I have is with the rubber nubs... I wear cloud foam tennis shoes and flip flops by adidas and they are amazing so trying these slides outside of the cloud foams was a chance I was willing to take . I’m hoping I can break them in by wearing them more or maybe my feet really are sensitive. As of right now they do hurt to walk in. I will update after one or two weeks wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for these slides for months! They're perfect! These are the "old" slides with the firm rubber-like nubs. If you walked into an Adidas brick-and-mortar store, you'll find the "new" version with soft foam-like nubs. I have some foot/calf problems that cause my muscles to be really tight. The nubs on these shoes help give me some relief. Only complaint: the sizing is a little off. These are wide (W) and I do have wide feet, so that's not the problem. However, it's a little long, like the 9w fits for like a 9.5W..
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Redesigned Adissage is awful
customer_reviews.text: I've owned about four pairs of Adissage sandals in my life. Two in the past 3 years. The ones I just got, the ones with "ADIDAS" stamped on the bottom, are a cheap new design. They feel light in my hand, not the same material as the old ones, they are big and boxy around my feet, and don't have the same arch support as the originals. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: lady1291

customer_reviews.title: Excruciating to wear
customer_reviews.text: Felt like I was walking on a hundred nails. It got so bad one day when I was out shopping that I hobbled to a shoe store to buy different shoes. Oddly, they didn't hurt EVERY time I wore them, but often enough that I had to toss them even though they were in great condition and pricey. Never ever EVER buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to change what made these shoes good...
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite flip flops back in high school, so I wanted a fresh new pair. The nubs used to poke your feet and it was the best feeling putting these on, but now Adidas went and changed the design!! The top of the shoe isn't as nice and the nubs are so short now! You've killed the reason I loved this shoe. Bring back the old design that people liked! Gosh darnit Adidas.. You've made me write my first review ever because of the extent of your imprudence. My feet are sad.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and feel of the shoes now that I have found the right size for me. I have short wide flat feet so I usually get 8w. But I found that to be too big for me so I got a regular 7 in Women's and adjusted the strap accordingly. I don't like that after a while the shoes start to shed the little massage things in the shoes and soon there are little black dots all over your floors. Still, overall they're good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carol

customer_reviews.title: takes time to get used to them but worth every minute
customer_reviews.text: I use them as my slippers. It was painful to wear them at the beginning, so I started with thin socks. After a couple of days I went bare feet and never looked back. I wear them every day, my feel never hurt. I really like how I can just rinse them under the shower for a quick cleanup without worrying they'll fall apart like all my other regular slippers. I really like to wear slippers at home and those are perfect for around the house after a day at work.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this Desert Rat
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and practical -- I live in the Sonoran Desert where it's mostly hot and hotter. Most of the year I'm barefoot -- indoors. The hot sand and sidewalk discourage bare feet in the summer, and the dry vegetation hurts my tender soles in the winter. Then there's the occasional downpour, believe it or not! So these sandals are ideal -- slip on and off quickly, waterproof, thick soles insulate, and the massage factor -- boy is that ever great. (note of caution -- start slowly, wearing a little longer each day. The massage action gives your tootsie muscles a workout; you could have muscle aches if you push the envelope too far.)
customer_reviews.author: R. PutneyTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Are these counterfeit?
customer_reviews.text: These are either fake or Adidas has totally changed the material they're made from. I've been buying these for DECADES, wear them almost constantly. They're the only shoes I wear in the house. They normally take a brief period to mold to the foot and then are wonderful. This pair is hard as concrete. Every time I wore them my back and ankles hurt like hell. I kept trying to 'break them in' but weeks later they were no better. Thank God I kept my old ones to wear for now. I'll try these again but will get them at Kohls next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L

customer_reviews.title: Unisex Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear these at home and they do not hurt my feet. They are great. The sizing is Unisex. I wear a women's size 8 and ordered these in size 6. I also have the Adilette slides in a size 6 (same sandal but without the bumps). Based on previous reviews that say these are women's specific sizing, they are not in my opinion. I originally purchased these in size 8, thinking they were different from my Adilette sandals and had to exchange the size 8 for a size 6. The size 8 was equivalent to a women's 10.
customer_reviews.author: miami22

customer_reviews.title: Hard to break in
customer_reviews.text: I've had Adissage sandals before and I got used to the padding within a few days. These, however, may possibly be stiffer because I find myself getting uncomfortable after wearing them for too long even though I have now had them for almost 2 months. Forget about squatting down in these, they make the balls of my feet raw. Another thing is that these easily collect dust, dead skin and other random bits of debris in between the little nubs, this can sometimes make them start to smell. The best solution I've found is to take them into the shower and blast them with water, then hang them up to dry upside down, the smell goes away!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cebotari

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet. 💝
customer_reviews.text: My job has me moving a lot on my feet all day. The little massaging nubs take some getting use to, but now I LOVE putting them on after work & walking around my home, taking grandkids for a walk, grocery shopping on weekends. The massage on my feet feels wonderful. Ty Amazon & adidas. 😄💟
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Happy

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable..
customer_reviews.text: I get heel bruises frequently from not wearing shoes on my hardwood floors and I thought this might be a good shoe for me. The ‘massage’ effect is not for me. My feet are sore after only a couple hours. They are hard and uncomfortable. I’m returning them and buying my standard Adidas slides.
customer_reviews.author: CBPoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes because my feet hurt after an injury. My hope was that the bumps inside would help with the circulation and, thus, help me get rid of the pain quicker. When I first got them, I could only wear them for fifteen minutes or so at a time. Then, I had to switch to other shoes. Now, after a month or so, I can wear them comfortably most of the day, and most of the pain from that injury is gone. I'm extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Princess

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They look great (even though I only wear them around the house). The women's size 9 fits better than the men's size 8 which I had ordered previously, and the men's size seven is too small. I had ordered the men's in the past because they were cheaper, but because I like the shoe so much I went ahead and just ordered the women's. And I an so glad I did. I just wish they had these in black and pink!
customer_reviews.author: Carold77

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find them again
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair a couple years ago and loved them, but could not remember the brand. Was delighted to find them on amazon! Unlike flip-flops and a lot of cheap sandals, these are substantial enough to give my feet support. The little nubs 1) allow air flow beneath my feet and 2) massage the bottom of my feet, as I walk. Although I prefer going barefoot when home, these can be worn in comfort whenever I am out and about, running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia

customer_reviews.title: I will buy these again and again
customer_reviews.text: These are made exactly like a pair I have except the design is different. I have loved them from the moment I put them on. I wore my last pair nearly every day. It was so easy to slip into them. They are perfect for wearing to have a pedicure because you can put them on without messing up your nails. I was very happy to find them and they are worth every penny I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: sparkle17

customer_reviews.title: Not anymore :(
customer_reviews.text: They do hurt your feet as other reviewers have mentioned. I used to slide on my husbands when I needed to run outside real quick and they didn't seem to hurt but these, now, hurt like heck. Even if I wear socks they start to hurt. Hmmmm, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: QUIqui

customer_reviews.title: Slender slides.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely slide. I wear 11 but purchased a 12 just for extra room. I would say d slide is true to size as there is actually extra length. But this slide is not for wide feet I had given this slide a 5 star but have reduced it to 1 star as as the inner studs have almost all fallen off in such a short time
customer_reviews.author: Edd.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable (though wish the knobs lasted longer)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable (though it takes a few days for the foot to adjust, if you have not worn these kind of shoes before). This is the 3rd pair of the same shoes I ordered. My only wish would be that the knobs would last longer, as some of the other reviews suggested. I wear size 10 sandals/slippers and size 11 shoes. I ordered size 10 and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sun Tan

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my!! I love these!! I keep them in my flight attendant bag for layovers and let me tell you, after being on my feet all day then putting these bad boys on, with the spikey looking insole thingies (lol), they feel soooo good! Like a foot massage with every step. On some reviews ppl said it hurt or whatnot, but not for me! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa98

customer_reviews.title: Way too painful,do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my daughter she literally was in tears from the pain these caused her. So with her and I wearing the same size I decided to wear them I didn't even make it then minutes and could tell why she was in such pain from wearing them for hours. Never again will I buy these. I tried with socks to see if it helps but the only thing that helped was tossing them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Great Slide
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I was about 7 months pregnant and couldn't handle walking around the house without something supportive on my feet. These so far have been great, no more aches and pains, and the little nubs feel great after you get use to them. I like that the strap is adjustable, especially since my feet may start to swell. Overall, this is a great shoe for the price. I will say they do run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Definitely buying another one!!
customer_reviews.text: This slipper is worth the investment. It’s such a great product for anything, I use it mostly at home, sometimes outside if my feet are in pain. It lasted 4 years with me, it’s old now, but I still use it around the house. Definitely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Mesdary

customer_reviews.title: If you’ve never worn “massage”-type sandals before, DO!!! You’ll love them!
customer_reviews.text: I complete wore out another similar sandal by another manufacturer, and that one was no longer in production. So I ordered this one. I can only say that, if you’ve never worn “massage” type sandals, DO. They are wonderful. At first, you need to wear them a little at a time to get used to the feeling....then you never want anything else on your feet. They are so great!
customer_reviews.author: Coby

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe not so good material
customer_reviews.text: I had the same shoe in a different color that last for four years before the massaging bottom start falling off. The new pair the little massaging sole pieces are almost completely gone on the left shoe. They started falling off shortly after I purchased the shoes like maybe it is dry rot material.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G

customer_reviews.title: Zero arch support
customer_reviews.text: If these slides are supposed to be therapeutic for painful feet, they sorely miss the mark because they have no arch support. And half sizes would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: bb8484

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not at all comfortable for tender feet
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 2.5 if I could. 50% OK for quality and style, and 50% NO-NO for discomfort. I’ve been wearing mine for a week and it’s still not comfortable. The bristles are hard plastic which makes the floor feel like walking on cloud (literally, not exaggerating) when you take it off. It’s okay when you wear it with socks though so that’s the only way i’ll be wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Soueidan

customer_reviews.title: These are the best damn sandals on earth
customer_reviews.text: These are the best damn sandals on earth. They do run just a tiny bit large. If you generally go for a half size I would round down. I wear 8.5 and got an 8 and they're perfectly roomy. These are crazy in that when you first get them they do hurt a bit. I would suggest being "one of those people" and wearing socks with them until they wear down a bit and then enjoy the magic that is your footwear. I will never not have a pair of these in my possesion.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for easing sore post-workout feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. For the last 12 years I have been wearing these after workouts (soccer, running, etc.). My last pair was warped when I accidently left them out in the sun. I love these for after running... they are a nice little massage for my feet. If I have stopped wearing them during the winter, the first few times my feet are a little sore after.
customer_reviews.author: Roo99Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute but painful
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but they are extremely uncomfortable. I wore them just to the grocery story and the bottom of my feet were sore for 2 days. I’m not sure if they need to be broken in or what but as they are now they are so painful I can’t even wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today! The slides are fit perfectly as I ordered, a little loose the way it came but it's got adjustable velcro. Not sure if it's because I'm Asian and have worn harsher massage slippers before, but the little bumps on these are very soft and not at all uncomfortable. They make your feet tingle a little bit when you're sitting but definitely do not require breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, so sad these didn't work out. They look great, they are exactly what I wanted but they hurt like a mother to wear! My feet start having the searing pain in 10-15 minutes from those little nubs that the soles are made of. I tried to like them but they are just unbearable. My feet are not super rough so I thought that may be it--but my child couldn't wear his either and he goes barefoot regularly. Sad. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and easy to take care of
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair - I have been wearing the first one for about 2 years now around the house, and they are still good. I am getting this one because my Mom likes to wear mine when she comes over)) The shoes give you a nice massage for blood circulation, however, you need to get used to it first as your feet could hurt first couple of weeks. Try wearing them for 10-15 min at first, and then extend the wearing time. The shoes are well made and super steady, could be slippery when wet. Easy to take care of - just wash them under the running water and they look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Novak

customer_reviews.title: price is unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove I got a seven and I’m usually a 6 and a half but my feet are a little swolen right from being almost ten months pregnant. I loved the price for these I was able to get two pair. I got a pair for my husband a couple months back at the mall and wish I should’ve waited to order from here. Feels even better when you take them off and walk on the floor after you’ve worn them for a while. They literally message your feet
customer_reviews.author: Megan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Walking on hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: Yikes, I thought those where rubber massage points, but instead it feels like hard plastic needles. The dollar tree sandals are more comfortable. I'll be returning these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: I’d like to think I have pretty tough feet too
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be high quality. But had to return because they were not “massaging”. They actually really hurt my feet even just wearing for more than 2 minutes. I’d like to think I have pretty tough feet too.
customer_reviews.author: HilaryOhh

customer_reviews.title: Comfy while it lasts (7 months)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable while it lasts. I’ve used these sandals most days in my house for 7 months. At around 7 months they started showing signs of wear in the cushioned area near the toe of both sandals. The little raised nubs started breaking off in that area. One of the sandals is now uncomfortable because of it. I wish these would have at least made it to a year if not more. I don’t know if I buy again. I rather find something that lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of this Adidas women's style. I wear them year 'round in the house and to make a quick run to the mailbox or put out the trash; don't wear them to shop or drive, etc. The adjustable tab is a blessing for folks with narrow feet. The "nubs" on the footbed don't bother me. I have tried another version with smaller nubs on the footbed and returned them because that style was extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massage for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have had it for about a year now. The little nubs hurt when I first tried them on, but I wore socks for a week and after that was able to wear them without socks. They feel great. I wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: The color is so fun - black with the aqua footbed
customer_reviews.text: My middle school daughter loves these! The color is so fun - black with the aqua footbed. She wanted them for after cross country and basketball but loves them so much, she's been wearing them to school too :-) Now her friends want them too! After a few weeks of wear, so far, no problems with smell. I can't tell yet if the nubby footbed will be better or worse for smell than the padded footbed that my son wears. It looks like these will wash better than the padded version so that's another plus. If they do get too stinky, I can tell this material can withstand a couple hours in the freezer so that problem will be solved.
customer_reviews.author: bran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this product due to the many comments about the size differences but I decided to give it a try and they're a perfect fit! I'm happy I gave them a try and I got them in my women's size and they fit perfectly! They massage my feet and are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHappySunshine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable WITH SOCKS
customer_reviews.text: The massage nubs felt a little uncomfortable to me and i thought I had made a bad purchase. I decided to wear them again, this time with socks and they felt pretty comfortable afterwards. I love wearing these WITH SOCKS everywhere I go, my feet feel great and plus I can show off my superhero socks when I wear them :p
customer_reviews.author: Mary Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to the great price on this brand name product compared to what I've seen in the sporting goods stores. I normally fit between a women's 10.5-11. This product didn't have sz 11, but the reviews said the sizes were generous - so I took a chance on the sz 10. The sole is the perfect size, and the adjustable top strap helps with the high rise of my foot. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I've probably owned about 25 pairs. The best part about them is that the bottoms are very sturdy. They are also amazing if you get plantar fasciitis. I keep a pair for indoors and use them all the time to walk around in. I can spend all day walking anywhere in these!
customer_reviews.author: shrimpeez

customer_reviews.title: Great slides but order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Love these but they are at least a size if not a size and a half too large. I wear a Ladies Size 10 and they were so large I gave them to my husband who is a Men's Size 10 and they fit him perfectly. I seem to recall from years ago when I bought these that I had to order one size smaller. My husband says he really likes them. They do take a bit of getting used to if you haven't worn them before..
customer_reviews.author: Golf Girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slides a year ago and I've used them everyday since I have purchased them. They are amazing and obviously with time the little spiked things all around the slippers start to fall off. For the price it is not that bad. Ask for a size smaller because I ordered my size and it looks like it is a size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They suck
customer_reviews.text: There a killer worst feeling sure I ever put on in my life those rubber things that stick up kill my feet
customer_reviews.author: haroldlheureux

customer_reviews.title: A bit too harsh
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute, but they also make my feet hurt and leave little circular marks. I went to go get the mail in these, and it felt like a bunch of little rubber needles poking into the bottoms of my feet. Not for me because I might have a bit more sensitive feet, but if you like a more harsh masage, then maybe it will work
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite. Sandals. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: The best sandal purchase I’ve ever made. After years of my feet sliding around in ill-fitting flip flops, these are comfy and stay put on my feet. I wore them daily for moths and there’s barely and signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 'em again
customer_reviews.text: We went traveling and my wife forgot her slides. When I asked her if she wanted to see what else was out there she told me she was happy to have another pair of these. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Hellified

customer_reviews.title: She says they're very comfortable now. She has been obsessed with slide sandals ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife & she loves them. They were a little hard on her feet at first, but she just wore socks for a couple of days & they broke in perfectly. She says they're very comfortable now. She has been obsessed with slide sandals since high school & she's very happy with these. She wears them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stephi Does NailsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Hurts like beyond
customer_reviews.text: Feels like walking on glass then after effect of burning your feet off when worn by feet only not with socks
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: not true women's size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is advertised as women's size; but the size was for a men's shoe that I received. Women could easily wear the style but order down a couple of sizes; if all are like what I received. It was far too large to adjust the strap tighter
customer_reviews.author: gabalot

customer_reviews.title: Love Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Adidas and my Dad wears these slides so I bought myself a pair. My feet are always sore and achy so I thought the "massage" feature would help. Turns out my feet are too sensitive for the little rubber nubs. It hurt like hell to walk around on them! I returned them and bought the Adidas super cloud slides and those are PERFECT. :)
customer_reviews.author: JennyMarie

customer_reviews.title: they run kinda large. Im an 8 on my ...
customer_reviews.text: they run kinda large. Im an 8 on my left foot and 8.5 right foot and purchased these sandals size 8 and they are somewhat large. I should have gone with size 7. I still like the design/colors of the sandal and they are quite comfortable. Would buy again but different size
customer_reviews.author: books_only4you

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I found the sole very hard and the "bumps" uncomfortable. Perhaps wearing them and breaking the shoes in would render them more comfortable, but why on earth would I go through the process? I have a pair of Adidas Superstars which I love. Will look for a similar pair and return these.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: The product itself was an ok quality however, I ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was an ok quality however, I ordered a m for medium I assume. I received a W for wide. Because this was a gift I now have to return product and buy something else. Disappointed😢
customer_reviews.author: Jazziedelight

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking slide just do something about the way its going when on people feet.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe itself but the one thing I don't like is how the slide makes your feet looks as if their going in one direction and the shoe going in another I never liked that I was just hoping that didn't happen but it did.
customer_reviews.author: Tweetybyrd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We bought these June 5th they fell apart August 5th cant exchange them because the exchange window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, KNOCK-OFFS
customer_reviews.text: If you believe you're buying authentic Adidas, you're not. They advertise the ones with the registered trademark by the brand name, but they arrive without them. I found real ones on sale for cheaper through a sporting goods store.
customer_reviews.author: Starlite

customer_reviews.title: It’s much more comfortable wearing socks with them but I absolutely refuse to ...
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that the rubber massagers on the undersides of your feet are a little much for me personally. I haven’t really been able to wear these sandals anywhere except around the house because they hurt too much. It’s much more comfortable wearing socks with them but I absolutely refuse to leave the house wearing socks with sandals. Here’s to hoping the socks will help break them in. I love how super casual they are and hopefully they’ll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Make my soles say “Ouch”
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I love the look/style and price. I’ve had them a month now and the lettering on the heals have begun to wear off (you can see in the picture). I thought the soles would be cushiony and comfortable, but I’m finding the opposite is true. They are painful to wear without socks and I’m not a sock with sandal type person. I wouldn’t purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: While reading the reviews ppl were complaining abt them being too big. I’m am a us 8.5 sometimes 9 so I bought an 8 and they fit perfectly. However the adidas sign has already started coming off the inside of the slippers so I’m a bit disappointed but I still do love them. They are really comfy. Also persons were complaining abt the hardness or the inside; I never experienced that.
customer_reviews.author: Zempathy

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a bed of nails
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. The nubby insole feels like nails poking into my foot. They are nothing like the other pair of these I own.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scheuermann

customer_reviews.title: my feet have been getting really sore and these bad boys give me all the comfort
customer_reviews.text: From working out, my feet have been getting really sore and these bad boys give me all the comfort. I'm so glad I bought them. Definitely wear them with socks. My feet would start to sweat and the get rubbed raw with bare feet. Even a thin pair of socks does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Biazar

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable. I usually wear a size 6, I probably could of gotten away with a size 5 but I mostly use them for house slippers so I don't really mind. The Velcro strap helps tighten them so they don't slide off at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: PAIN
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and painful. Feet were raw after one evening, took a few days to recover. There's no way I could endure trying to break these in. Torture.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners!
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot and these are perfect for afterward. It's like a massage for my feet and no one dares put them on because they don't like the feel. My roommate said they hurt when she tried them on, but I found them relaxing. At first they were a tad uncomfortable, but that quickly went away and they've become a part of my injury prevention routine.
customer_reviews.author: Bear93

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. Fit is true to size. I've been wearing these sandals for abt 4-5 years. They energize my feet. I wear them around the house all the time. With wear, the little nubs begin to fall off...that's when it's time for a new pair. Came in 2 days. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: DST

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a size 9, received a size 8.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of these shoes for a long, long time. Since my early teen years. I've owned several pairs of these. I purchased a size 9, the size I've always purchased. I opened them, and the Adidas box they were in said size 9. However, the shoes themselves say size 8 on the bottom. I'm not sure how this happened, but I like them too much to return them. I'll eventually break them in and they'll fit better, but it was pretty disappointing to see they were a size too small. Still a good shoe. And as long as Adidas makes them, I will buy them.
customer_reviews.author: R J

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable slide with massaging soles
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can adjust the fit on these, in case you might be wearing socks sometimes, or not. Without socks, the nubbies are a bit hard on my 60+ year old feet, but that's probably an age thing. I'm sure a 25 year old would barely feel them. They do have a massaging action that is somewhat pleasant. Quality appears to be good.
customer_reviews.author: kendallzemp

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. They're cute and (mostly) comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They're cute and (mostly) comfortable. I dropped a star because the pegs on the sole straight-up HURT until your feet get used to them. They're slightly smaller than I expected, but still fit. The strap is velcro and adjustable, so width isn't an issue. Also, the "ADIDAS" stamp on the heel has worn off completely after they were worn less than a handful of times, but I don't really care about that. Overall, they're a good pair of sandals, but if you suffer from foot soreness, maybe think twice about these.
customer_reviews.author: LC Smith

customer_reviews.title: My feet are happy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I've been looking around for a while for a pair of acupressure sandals and these work great. I put them on first thing in the morning and they help wake me up by stimulating the nerve endings in my feet. And the fit is perfect. I have very small feet so ordering shoes online is always a gamble. I'm a women's size 5.5 and I ordered the 5 and it's just right. Very satisfied and I'd get them again.
customer_reviews.author: MMMakestheWorldGoRound

customer_reviews.title: Great for the house
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these sandals. I wear them all the time at home. The nubs in the shoe keep my feet going. Great for after shower too. The down side is the nubs do breakdown and fall out after a while. That is why I am on my third pair. The sandals usually last me about a year and half. The sandals use to have a wider variety of colors to choose from. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: At first the bumps took adjusting to but after wearing them for an hour a day for a few days I love these. They are my most comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E Gibbons

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Adissage W Slide Sandal
product_meta.description: Your feet work hard — whether on the soccer field, running laps, or in overtime on the basketball court. After your workout, give your feet some love and attention. Adissage women’s massage slide sandals treat tired feet right with hundreds of synthetic nubs that provide quick recovery.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately 6-12 inches from arch
Boot opening measures approximately 0-3 inches around
